metadata.title: HARRY POTTER TEMPORARY TATTOOS
description: You can become Harry with the dab of a sponge with these temporary tattoos! Lightning bolts and house crests included. Warning, Choking Hazard! Contains small parts not suitable for children under 3 years.
metadata.details: {"Brand": "Rubie's", "Water Resistance Level": "Water Resistant", "Number of Pieces": "1", "Age Range (Description)": "Kid", "Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Department": "Unisex-child", "Date First Available": "July 7, 2007", "Manufacturer": "Rubie's Costume Company"}
